compliant.section: 美國境內各管轄區提供居民保護其個人資料的權利。
compliant.legal provisions: Chapter 3 Rights of the Data Subject

compliant.section: 要求提供資訊或刪除。 美國某些州別的居民有權知道我們是否處理您的個人資訊，在某些情況下，可要求我們將過去 12 個月所收集的下列類別資訊揭露給您。對於所有資訊的索取，我們有權要求驗證您的身分。
compliant.article numbers: Article 12 - Transparent information, communication and modalities for the exercise of the rights of the data subject, Article 15 - Right of access by the data subject
compliant.legal provisions: Chapter 3 Rights of the Data Subject

compliant.section:
因應這項權利，我們應該提供予您：
我們所收集到關於您的個人資訊類別。
您的個人資訊被收集的來源類別。
需要收集、販售、分享或揭露您個人資訊的業務或商業目的，以及針對此目的所揭露的個人資訊類別。
我們與其分享您個人資訊的第三方類別。
compliant.article numbers: Article 13 - Information to be provided where personal data are collected from the data subject, Article 14 - Information to be provided where personal data have not been obtained from the data subject
compliant.legal provisions: Chapter 3 Rights of the Data Subject

compliant.section: 此外，您有權要求我們刪除您的個人資訊。
compliant.article numbers: Article 17 - Right to erasure ("right to be forgotten")
compliant.legal provisions: Chapter 3 Rights of the Data Subject

compliant.section: 要求修正。美國境內特定州的居民有權要求修正或改正居民個人的不正確資訊。
compliant.legal provisions: Chapter 3 Rights of the Data Subject

compliant.section: 在某些情況下，美國境內特定州的居民有權要求收到其個人資訊的可攜式格式，以便資料能傳送給其他單位。
compliant.legal provisions: Chapter 3 Rights of the Data Subject

non_compliant.section: 我們已經販售的任何關於您的個人資訊類別（如有的話），以及購買您個人資訊的第三方類別，以及按類別販售予第三方的個人資訊類別。
non_compliant.article numbers: Article 17 - Right to erasure ("right to be forgotten")
non_compliant.legal provisions: Chapter 3 Rights of the Data Subject, GDPR does not differentiate between selling and sharing data.  The right to erasure should apply regardless of whether the data was sold or shared.
non_compliant.amend: You have the right to request that we delete your personal information, regardless of whether it was sold or shared.

non_compliant.section: 美國境內特定州的居民有權選擇拒絕販售或分享消費者的個人資訊。
non_compliant.legal provisions: Chapter 3 Rights of the Data Subject,  GDPR provides for a broader right to object to processing, not just selling or sharing.
non_compliant.amend: You have the right to object to the processing of your personal data.  This includes the right to object to the processing of your personal data for direct marketing purposes.
